title: Jelle Glebbeek - Portfolio
nav.title: Jelle Glebbeek
masthead.lead: More about me? Just scroll down.
about.title: About me
about.description:
Hi, I'm Jelle. I've always had a passion for computers and the technology behind them. Thats why I started programming at the age of 9, in the mean time I have learned multiple languages by myself. I have studied Computer Science at the Leiden University of Applied Sciences, specialising in Software Engineering, making programming my job.

In my free time I like to cycle on my mountainbike as well as play games on my battlestation. I have build up quite the game library in my time gaming, with 850+ games in my library you could say I like collecting games.

Feel free to check out my game library or some of the coding projects I work on!

projects.jelleglebbeek.title: jelleglebbeek.com
projects.jelleglebbeek.text: The site you are on right now, with some information about me and the projects I work on.
projects.galeriewijna.title: Galeriewijna.nl
projects.galeriewijna.text: A simple but good looking website where paintings that are up for sale get showcased.
projects.esv.title: Easy Sphere Viewer
projects.esv.text: View 360 degree photospheres and cubemaps with this fast and really straightforward program.
projects.ytdlgui.title: youtube-dl-gui
projects.ytdlgui.text: An easy to use program to download videos and playlists from YouTube and many more services.
projects.gm4.title: GameMode 4
projects.gm4.text: A minecraft plugin derived from the popular GM4 datapacks which adds tons of new features to the game.
projects.squidwards.title: Master Squidwards
projects.squidwards.text: My very own setup where I spend most of my days. The name obviously comes from Spongebob (don't ask why).
